Hillsboro.West Union Baptist Church:
West Union Baptist Church is a Baptist congregation and historic church structure in West Union, Oregon, United States.


== History ==
The Baptist congregation was founded in 1844 and met in the home of pioneer David Thomas Lenox until 1853, when he donated 2 acres (8,100 m2) of his land for a church and cemetery. The one-story, Classical Revival style building was built of hand-sawn lumber on what is now West Union Road for a little over $1,500.
